dct_description_sm: This dataset represents highways for Colorado in 2003. The dataset was originally published by the Colorado Department of Transportation on April 13, 2004.[Features in this dataset represent segments of public highways that are maintained by and under the jurisdiction of the Colorado Department of Transportation. These highways consist of Interstates, US Highways, and State Highways. Features are represented by polyline (linear) geographic shapes.]
